ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: re:patch probs
ygData.msgSnippet: This may or may not be here nor there, but it appears to me that the lag problem and DX9 patches they ve had only affect certain video cards.  As I said, I run
ygData.messageBody:
This may or may not be here nor there, but it appears to me that the lag problem and DX9 patches they've had only affect certain video cards.  As I said, I run a P4 1.8 Ghz with a gig of RAM and a 128MB ATI Radeon 9200 video card.  I very rarely have game stopping lag.  It lags mostly in POK and bazaar when there are high concentrations of people, but I drop my clipping distance to 0 and its smooth as butter.  My system's not even as powerful as some others I've seen/heard who still have lag issues so I'm thinking it must be video card related.    Any thoughts?
 
Wulfric/Raido
